title: "PIGINet: MIT's New AI to Enhance Robots' Planning, Problem Solving, and MORE by as much as 80 Percent"
excerpt: "A new artificial intelligence (AI) was developed by researchers from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) to bring an enhancement to robots' capabilities in households, calling this system, the PIGINet. This new AI will help in enhancing the capabilities of household robots with a significant boost of as much as 50 to 80 percent."
